name: Ekta Ramnani
greetingText: My dearest sister, my role model, my lifeline â¤
wishText: May your kindness, generosity, and beautiful soul shine forever!
textInChatBox: Happy Raksha Bandhan, my adorable sister Ekta! You mean the world to me, Gudda loves you always â¤
text2: I was going to just wish you.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you loved it as much as I loved making it for you â¤
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again and smile.
